original_text: Now a man who was lame from birth was being carried to the temple gate called Beautiful, where he was put every day to beg from those going into the temple courts.
korean_text: 나면서 못 걷게 된 이를 사람들이 메고 오니 이는 성전에 들어가는 사람들에게 구걸하기 위하여 날마다 미문이라는 성전 문에 두는 자라

sentences.original_text: Now a man who was lame from birth
sentences.korean_translation: 나면서부터 다리 저는 한 사람이 있었는데

sentences.original_text: was being carried to the temple gate
where he was put every day
to beg from those going into the temple courts
sentences.korean_translation: 성전 뜰로 들어가는 사람들에게 구걸하기 위해
